00009 #ifndef BOOST_TT_INTRINSICS_HPP_INCLUDED
00010 #define BOOST_TT_INTRINSICS_HPP_INCLUDED
00011 
00012 #ifndef BOOST_TT_CONFIG_HPP_INCLUDED
00013 #include "boost/type_traits/config.hpp"
00014 #endif
00015 
00016 //
00017 // Helper macros for builtin compiler support.
00018 // If your compiler has builtin support for any of the following
00019 // traits concepts, then redefine the appropriate macros to pick
00020 // up on the compiler support:
00021 //
00022 // (these should largely ignore cv-qualifiers)
00023 // BOOST_IS_UNION(T) should evaluate to true if T is a union type
00024 // BOOST_IS_POD(T) should evaluate to true if T is a POD type
00025 // BOOST_IS_EMPTY(T) should evaluate to true if T is an empty struct or union
00026 // BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_CONSTRUCTOR(T) should evaluate to true if "T x;" has no effect
00027 // BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_COPY(T) should evaluate to true if T(t) <==> memcpy
00028 // BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_ASSIGN(T) should evaluate to true if t = u <==> memcpy
00029 // BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_DESTRUCTOR(T) should evaluate to true if ~T() has no effect
00030 
00031 #ifdef BOOST_HAS_SGI_TYPE_TRAITS
00032     // Hook into SGI's __type_traits class, this will pick up user supplied
00033     // specializations as well as SGI - compiler supplied specializations.
00034 #   include "boost/type_traits/is_same.hpp"
00035 #   include <type_traits.h>
00036 #   define BOOST_IS_POD(T) ::boost::is_same< typename ::__type_traits<T>::is_POD_type, ::__true_type>::value
00037 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_CONSTRUCTOR(T) ::boost::is_same< typename ::__type_traits<T>::has_trivial_default_constructor, ::__true_type>::value
00038 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_COPY(T) ::boost::is_same< typename ::__type_traits<T>::has_trivial_copy_constructor, ::__true_type>::value
00039 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_ASSIGN(T) ::boost::is_same< typename ::__type_traits<T>::has_trivial_assignment_operator, ::__true_type>::value
00040 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_DESTRUCTOR(T) ::boost::is_same< typename ::__type_traits<T>::has_trivial_destructor, ::__true_type>::value
00041 
00042 #   ifdef __sgi
00043 #      define BOOST_HAS_TYPE_TRAITS_INTRINSICS
00044 #   endif
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 #if defined(__MSL_CPP__) && (__MSL_CPP__ >= 0x8000)
00048     // Metrowerks compiler is acquiring intrinsic type traits support
00049     // post version 8.  We hook into the published interface to pick up
00050     // user defined specializations as well as compiler intrinsics as 
00051     // and when they become available:
00052 #   include <msl_utility>
00053 #   define BOOST_IS_UNION(T) BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::is_union<T>::value
00054 #   define BOOST_IS_POD(T) BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::is_POD<T>::value
00055 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_CONSTRUCTOR(T) BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::has_trivial_default_ctor<T>::value
00056 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_COPY(T) BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::has_trivial_copy_ctor<T>::value
00057 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_ASSIGN(T) BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::has_trivial_assignment<T>::value
00058 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_DESTRUCTOR(T) BOOST_STD_EXTENSION_NAMESPACE::has_trivial_dtor<T>::value
00059 #   define BOOST_HAS_TYPE_TRAITS_INTRINSICS
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #ifndef BOOST_IS_UNION
00063 #   define BOOST_IS_UNION(T) false
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 #ifndef BOOST_IS_POD
00067 #   define BOOST_IS_POD(T) false
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 #ifndef BOOST_IS_EMPTY
00071 #   define BOOST_IS_EMPTY(T) false
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_CONSTRUCTOR
00075 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_CONSTRUCTOR(T) false
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_COPY
00079 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_COPY(T) false
00080 #endif
00081 
00082 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_ASSIGN
00083 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_ASSIGN(T) false
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 #ifndef BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_DESTRUCTOR
00087 #   define BOOST_HAS_TRIVIAL_DESTRUCTOR(T) false
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 #endif // BOOST_TT_INTRINSICS_HPP_INCLUDED
